com.example.demo.tableLinks

Class GuildLinkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.tableLinks.GuildLinkController

  • @RestController
public class GuildLinkController
extends java.lang.Object
    The perpose of GuildLinkController is used to - Add a user to a guild. - Delete a user from a guild. - update a user role in a guild. from the front end to the back end. It is also able to be modified to add any status that the guild has on the preticular user
